name: Office UI Fabric Fonts
description: Official Microsoft Office fonts developed for building experiences that fit seamlessly into Office and Office 365
need: We use Office Fabric font icons for header menu buttons.
comment: We override font file path definitions in our layout.css. Original paths are defined in fabric.min.css and they point to Microsoft's servers.

file.description: Office365icons font icons in EOT format.
